00030 void reportQuESTEnv(QuESTEnv env){
00031         printf("EXECUTION ENVIRONMENT:\n");
00032         printf("Running locally on one node\n");
00033         printf("Number of ranks is %d\n", env.numRanks);
00034 # ifdef _OPENMP
00035         printf("OpenMP enabled\n");
00036         printf("Number of threads available is %d\n", omp_get_max_threads());
00037 # else
00038         printf("OpenMP disabled\n");
00039 # endif
00040         printf("Precision: size of REAL is %ld bytes\n", sizeof(REAL));
00041 }

00047 REAL calcTotalProbability(MultiQubit multiQubit){
00048   /* IJB - implemented using Kahan summation for greater accuracy at a slight floating
00049      point operation overhead. For more details see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kahan_summation_algorithm */
00050   /* Don't change the bracketing in this routine! */
00051   REAL pTotal=0; 
00052   REAL y, t, c;
00053   long long int index;
00054   long long int numAmpsPerRank = multiQubit.numAmps;
00055   c = 0.0;
00056   for (index=0; index<numAmpsPerRank; index++){ 
00057     /* Perform pTotal+=multiQubit.stateVec.real[index]*multiQubit.stateVec.real[index]; by Kahan */
00058    // pTotal+=multiQubit.stateVec.real[index]*multiQubit.stateVec.real[index];
00059     
00060     y = multiQubit.stateVec.real[index]*multiQubit.stateVec.real[index] - c;
00061     t = pTotal + y;
00062     c = ( t - pTotal ) - y;
00063     pTotal = t;
00064     
00065     /* Perform pTotal+=multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index]*multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index]; by Kahan */
00066     //pTotal+=multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index]*multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index];
00067     
00068     
00069     y = multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index]*multiQubit.stateVec.imag[index] - c;
00070     t = pTotal + y;
00071     c = ( t - pTotal ) - y;
00072     pTotal = t;
00073     
00074     
00075   } 
00076   return pTotal;
00077 }

00123 REAL findProbabilityOfOutcome(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int measureQubit, int outcome)
00124 {
00125         REAL stateProb=0;
00126         stateProb = findProbabilityOfZeroLocal(multiQubit, measureQubit);
00127         if (outcome==1) stateProb = 1.0 - stateProb;
00128         return stateProb;
00129 }
00130 
00131 REAL measureInState(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int measureQubit, int outcome)
00132 {
00133         REAL stateProb;
00134         stateProb = findProbabilityOfOutcome(multiQubit, measureQubit, outcome);
00135         if (stateProb!=0) measureInStateLocal(multiQubit, measureQubit, stateProb, outcome);
00136         return stateProb;
00137 }

00139 REAL filterOut111(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int idQubit1, const int idQubit2, const int idQubit3)
00140 {
00141         REAL stateProb=0;
00142         stateProb = probOfFilterOut111(multiQubit, idQubit1, idQubit2, idQubit3);
00143         if (stateProb!=0) filterOut111Local(multiQubit, idQubit1, idQubit2, idQubit3, stateProb);
00144         return stateProb;
00145 }
00146 
00147 REAL probOfFilterOut111(MultiQubit multiQubit, const int idQubit1, const int idQubit2, const int idQubit3)
00148 {
00149         REAL stateProb=0;
00150         stateProb = probOfFilterOut111Local(multiQubit, idQubit1, idQubit2, idQubit3);
00151         return stateProb;
00152 }
